snippet.title: Coastal Hill Mystery Hidden Object - iOS
snippet.description:
Explore over 35 top secret locations around town and find secret Hidden Objects that reveal the hidden Dark Legend mysteries of Coastal Hill! 

In Coastal Hill you find yourself in the center of the eeriest action and adventure full of Hidden Object and Match 3 mysteries, innuendos, and obscurities. The lighthouse town you once knew as a peaceful spot has changed completely. Some forces of darkness have shrouded this place. The town has started to lose hope and it’s up to you to find all of the hidden clues and solve the mystery. Immerse into the ominous atmosphere of Coastal Hill and fight back malign creatures. Begin your adventure right now and unravel the hidden mystery of this haunted town. Coastal hill is the fan-favorite free Hidden Objects Mystery Game on Google Play! 

Grab your bags and get ready for the ultimate search and race against time! 

--- COASTAL HILL MYSTERY FREE HIDDEN OBJECT SPECIAL FEATURES --

FIGHT haunted monsters through the wheel of fortune and collect valuable items!
CUSTOMIZE main character appearance(male, female): each look has its own perks;
SEEK adventure and find hidden objects in 7 search modes with unique investigation tools
DISCOVER 35 high quality locations around the mysterious city
GATHER over 75 collectibles (+300 more under development!)
SOLVE the greatest Mysteries on the creepy Coast!
THE PERFECT Hidden Object Mystery Game for free hidden object lovers!!
